response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to both parties, we are offering it to you at a special price of $14,000. We are confident that this offer presents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let us know. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
